scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run watch-sass"
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-sass
scripts.//build-js: browserify src/index.js -o public/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-react ] ] -p esmify  -t uglifyify --debug
scripts.test-cypress: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "budo src/index.js:bundle.js --dir=public/ --port=9966 --live --pushstate -- -p esmify -dv" "cypress open"
scripts.test-cypress-err: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "budo src/index.js:bundle.js --dir=public/ --port=9966 --live --pushstate -- -t [ envify --NODE_ENV test_err ] -p esmify -dv" "cypress open"
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run deps && npm test
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
